content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were driving south on i-91 in northen vermont south of st johnsbury, my wife though she saw a falling star, it was a red and orange traveling at a high rate of speed but it then stoped an hovered about 30 feet over the interstate as we drove under it. after it stopped it was just a white glow about 10 to 12 inch's across kind of star or diamond shaped, there was nothing around and we were not around any towns or lights. i lost sight of it after i drove under it. my wife saw it for about 5 seconds before it hovered and i only saw it for less than a second or two has i drove under it. my wife looked at me and ask "did you see that?" and i said yes. we joke most of the way back to our motel about seeing something like that and wondered what it was.
content.summary: Was driving south on i-91 in northen vermont, my wife though she saw a falling star, but it then stoped an hovered over the interstate as we drove under it

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my work truck and i stopped to get out and smoke, i was looking at the sky and seen a star above the mountains and i couldn't help to stare at it. then it started going up. i lost it and checked a little above where i seen it and just watched as it moved all the way to the top of the sky. then it was gone. too fast for a plane, jet or anything we have. it was orange with a little yellow. pulsed the colors. i know what i saw. but i did not have my phone or anything to record.
content.summary: Looked like a star above mauntian then acended to the sky

content.detailedDescription: Out side working in my yard,started feeling apprehensive. looked up and observed what appeared to be a drone. first it was 45 degrees west.  as i continued to observe this object, it appeared less than 50 feet above my house. i could see the fuselage, wings prop, everything!  its belly was whiteish gray, with no visible markings ecept for a round, black camera lens. when i first noticed this object, i was awestruck. it moved slowly and silently, with a transparent effect observed.I lost sight of this object when i looked down for my camera. i felt a sense of fear, nervousness, and increased anxiety.
content.summary: Apparent spy drone utilizing silent running and projection imagery

content.detailedDescription: Observed globe like object moving directly above me at approximately 10.30pm. this was spotted after 3 flashes (that i assumed were shooting stars) had passed above me in three different directions. these flashes were approximately 20min apart from 9pm.I waited as they looked to be materializing and or coming into the atmosphere. after globe like object was spotted high above for about 5min,it had disappeared when i went inside to grab my phone to capture image.
content.summary: Glowing globe like object.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north and noticed a diamond shaped orange light to the west of me. at first i thoight it was a star becase it was not moving. i glanced back to the road for about a second and looked back to see if i could figure out what it was it had vanished from the sky. i pulled over to search the entire sky but it was nowhere to be seen. this sighting happened around 11:45 pm on december 16th 2013 in bedford county virginia near goodview.
content.summary: I saw a diamond shaped light in the sky west of me as i was driving north

content.detailedDescription:
Went to the window to close the drape & have noticed it , it glowed , the exact description as seen it would be it has radiated in a golden pulsating matter yet it looked as if it was a giant star . it wasn't a saturn since it was way to the e & at high altitude , checked the sky as i've went out to take a photo's . actually i've also made a video of it (1 min 6 sec duration). i call this sighting a uap & not a ufo 'cause i'm not sure if it's some black project newest contraption or if it is actually an extraterrestial spaceship . reason for it being i did not feel any usual humming & pressure behind the ears . i simply was interested in it as it looked very pretty , like a large golden oval object that radiated rays , at least that's how i've seen it . however , on the photos it looked different , on each one & on the video too yet it looked very much different . on photos & video ot had all kinds of shapes & the colors had variations but always most prominent was the golden & white with some greeish to pink hue .
have nit seen it disappear as i was by then indoors reviewing my camera & after checking up on the object by the video afterwards it was just gone . 
it's not the only time since then that it just pops into the sky nearly in exact position & always to the seeing eye looks same yet on photos that is a different & amazing difference . so to summerize the dates that so far it showed up is : nov 19 th , dec 11th , dec 12 th & today dec 16th 2013 & durations of viewing the object varies as well . each time i just didn't want to blink ;p so i would not loose sight of this huge object & to tell the truth it felt the longer i'd look it seemed to be spinning , this confirmed via the photos !
so far i've analyzed all the photos & took screenshots of my video too which almost each segment was also analyzed & i must admit a lot of it leaves one mouth gaping in awe , whatever this thing is :)
btw , attached is the video plus 2 other photos from sighting on the 11th & 12th of dec.

i would like to forward most of the photos but writing this long form each time & with having many attachment is not very appealing . 
peace .
content.summary: Radiating golden uap , about 5 times larger then our saturn is but this object seen in sw area over the lakes (estimating ppl on both sides of the boarder had good view)

content.detailedDescription: I was inside watching tv when my daughter came in from outside. she told me there was a weird looking star in the sky and asked me to come outside and see it. when i went outside i did not see the object. we live underneath a very busy approach path for the austin international airport.  so she sees approching aircraft every night and knows what they look like. she describes the object as a triangle or chevron shape object just hovering high in the sky high enough that a plane flew underneath it.She said its stay hovering there for a few seconds and when she came to get me and we both went outside it had already disappeared. she did take a picture of it with her phone and it looks like a chevron against a black sky.
content.summary: My daughter saw a triangle  in the sky. she said it was just hovering above and witnessed planes flying underneath the object. she took a picture.

content.detailedDescription: Observed three red pulsating lights at least the size of pennies. originally thought they were three objects. these lights remained stationary, hovered, for a minute or so and began moving slowly northeast. one light was slightly higher than the others. the appeared to move in unison and that is why i then thought it may be one object. it slowly disappeared in about 4 minutes. jumped in car to see if i could see it again without luck. no sound, but not sure how far away it was. nothing i've ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three unknown red objects or one large object with red lights on edge

content.detailedDescription: Was outside at the patio barbecuing, my mother in law called to my attention "those interesting lights", at first thought they were balloons, then realized it was too many holding same flight path, speed and formation. air planes (commercial) further away in the background completely eliminated the possibility of being an airliner or executive jet. once i realized it could be a ufo i got thrilled... objects would just disappear in the distance as if they were om their way to somewhere.
content.summary: Several orange lights in groups of 3 to 5, about 5 groups and last one single light flying straight and fast

content.detailedDescription: Same saucer like on the show tonite i saw all new ancient aliens. the date and year are not exact. it was in early to mid eighties and it was dark but no doubt i am 100% what i saw. i am now fifties. then i was early 30's. i was so excited to get my wife to come out and see i broke the handle off on our screen door. it hoovered then was i lost in through tree coverage then i could no longer see it.
content.summary: Just came home from eating wife went inside house there it was hoovering slowly moving to the left

content.detailedDescription: My mother, 2 little sisters, and i were sitting in the car outside a mexican bakery in downtown la.  we were getting ready to drive off when my mom spotted some unusual, objects in the sky.  she freaked out and told us to look. my sisters and i looked up through the windshield of the car and noticed a bright, yellow-orange, fireball-like object in the sky lining up slowly. then a second, round, large, fireball-like object came and stopped in the sky, hoovering. then a third came along. they hoovered together for a few seconds and then all three took off into the sky at the same time. a second or two later, a fourth, round, fireball-like object came soaring through the sky.  by this time, my mother and i were outside of our car freaking out trying to take video on our phones. this fourth flying object really scared us because it was the biggest, brightest, and closest object of them all.  thus, it was easier to see.  it looked like a huge yellow burning star...It looked shapless and very bright.  luckily, we were able to capture some footage.  we were fortunate enough to capture a good video of the last flying object. which was the brightest and in the video it is the easiest to see. needless to say, i was in complete shock and utter disbelief of what we had all witnessed together.  i wanted to believe it was an airplane but it clearly was not.  airplanes in our area have white, yellow, and red flashing lights.  these objects we saw did not.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3, bright, yellow/orange, fireball-like objects observed hovering in the night sky, lining up and then taking off into the sky, then a 4th object followed behind, 4th object was the brightest, biggest, and closest

content.detailedDescription:
i have captured many photos of unknown objects from my nikon d50 digital camera.
i will post more photos soon. most of the time i am at home taking pictures of the sky.
or when i'm in my car. when i stop at a light i then take random photos our my car window. 
 most of the time i do not see anything in the sky.
  it's only when i look back at my photos on my mac computer that i see these objects.
i have many videos of objects taken at night. my reactions are a bit taken back and shocked
when i do capture these objects on digital camera and on video. every-time i take photo's i notice it had been very quiet. i make sure no airplanes are flying by at the time i take pictures.
 i live in the country so, i do have a lot of open sky. i don't know
why i am capturing so many objects in my photo's. i lived here for one year now. i've seen so many strange things in the sky.

december 16, 2013

thank you.
content.shape: Cigar,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Photo's of different type of objects in the sky from at my home and from my car. they were all silent. thank you.

content.detailedDescription: Last december 2012 me and my oldest son where standing on ex-wifes driveway outside the house we went there to get some computer stuffs and i was actually close by the sidewalk smoking a cigarettes then a light caught my eye looked up thats when i saw this half circle bright white flourescent with a small dark circle shape at the center of it flying on the of me about less than 2000 to 3000 feet duration of sighting is about 2 to 3 seconds with no sound after that i have thinking about it till now.
content.summary: Half round flourescent with a dark spot on center

content.detailedDescription:
I had a friend came with me tonight and we saw many different kinds of things. it was around midnight. a small tiny light in the sky that went in circles and zig zags in a tiny area. it was directly above our heads but way far up in the sky. we watched it for about 20 minutes and it didn���t stop it���s loops and circles and totally random seeming patterns.
then there was a flashing green and red object that would fly straight over the horizon (they are always about 30-40 feet above the houses) for 10 seconds then either turn around or go backwards for another 10 seconds. we saw this happen over and over again 22 times before we kept walking. we sat on a bench and lined up the light with a few trees and noticed that it only flew at the same altitude and when it hit one spot, it changed color (red to green) and when backwards, then when it hit a point it turned back to the other color and went forwards. flashing green in one direction and red in the other direction.
we saw some lights that would start as a small yellowish glow. the glowing ball would get bigger and bigger until it would shoot off into the distance. sometimes it would change into the white/green and red blinking lights and go away. sometime the glow was bigger than the street lights.
there were objects that would twinkle white lights. flashing and then something weird would happen and the lights would shutter or twinkle or something. and then they would just disappear. the lights were so strange. we didn't know what they were. my friend couldn't believe what she was seeing. she said there was no explanation. the lights were all so different that we saw in 1 night that it couldn't have been explained by 1 thing like some kids sending a remote controlled plane in the area or anything. it was exciting and we just couldn't explain what we were witnessing. it could have been something explainable, but we didn't know what it was.
content.summary: Glowing orange lights, twinkling white lights and randomly moving white lights.

content.detailedDescription:
The next night, july 19 i went for another walk. i was getting excited and hoping now that i could see something again. i told my friends about it and they insisted i take a camera but i thought if they knew i had a camera, maybe they wouldn���t show up. and who would i show the picture to anyways? and it would just look like a light in a sea of black and wouldn���t prove anything. i wanted to see them more than i wanted a picture. it wasn���t worth it to me. 
this time i was an hour later than the nights previous, at about 1:30 am. at the corner of the field where the pond is. i rounded the corner and i saw this huge round orb with rings around it. it looked like saturn. it was hovering about 50-100 feet over the pond. it was about 4 feet across. it was red and white lights but they were flashing smaller lights and much more quickly, like twinkling. it was like an orb and the lights were pulsing and shimmering, hard to explain. i was so excited! i ran to get closer, but it was so strange, every step i ran to see it, it seemed to keep moving back from me at the exact same distance as i was trying to get close to it. like it didn���t want me to get closer. so as i kept moving toward it, it kept moving away from me. i ran to see it and it went behind a tree. i kept running around the pond to see where it was going and just slowly rose up to about 150 feet and went slowly over the tops of the houses and out of my vision.
i continued on my walk. in another field, behind the trees came this one that had 1 stick and beside it was another stick but a bit smaller than the other one. they were tied together by a line. it was just about 1-2 feet big. then around the whole things was a saturn ring that was pulsing red these ones didn���t hover. they went straight north and didn���t stop or waver or anything. just went straight, sailing, with no noise, right over my head. it was so weird because i saw the whole shape, there was no one in it, i couldn't understand how it could be a kid with some toy because it came from behind me and went so far in the distance till it was out of sight. it was 2 a.M. and there was no one around. i didn't know what i thought it was. i saw 3 different ones come over those trees and just head north. towards where these fireballs were over the houses. i followed them. all week there had been these ���fireballs��� over the houses across the field. they were really bright. but they���d either be there or always go off in the sky at a 45 degree angle up and disappear. they didn���t seem to be anything but lights so i never thought of going to investigate.

i saw these ���fireballs��� (yellow-orange glowing stick-like things with the saturn rings around them). it was hovering over the houses across the field. bobbing up and down like it was in the water on a wave. there was a time when there were 4 of these things over the houses across the field from me. i started to go into the neighborhood and look for them. i would see one of them and run through someone���s yard and try to get closer to the object but they were only about 20 feet above the ground so the houses would obscure them. they were about the size of a beach ball, maybe 2 feet across of pure light. i���d try to run around the block and see them again. i would see one bobbing down in between 2 other houses and run for it. but by the time i always got to where it was, it was on the next street. they would go as high as just above the houses and then down in a yard then back up again. there were about 4 of these fireballs bobbing around for at least 3 hours. it seemed like they were looking for something or surveying the streets. they went from one street to the next. i hadn���t been in that neighborhood before so i didn���t know how to get around quickly and i was so tired running around the streets it was hard to keep up. the houses were too tall and the trees were blocking too much of the sky. i could see the ships sometimes in between the houses, but they would be moving and by the time i ran to the end of the street, i couldn���t see them anymore. then i would again but just couldn���t get to where they were at. i followed them for 3.5 hours this night. i could never get closer than 100 feet to them (1 house yard away). i was so curious but it wasn't a craft, they were just lights so i knew no one was in them so i wasn't afraid.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Circle,   Cross,   Fireball,   Saturn-like,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Fireballs, sailing crosses and saturn-like pulsating objects that i got to be about 50 feet away from.

content.detailedDescription:
July 18 i returned at the same time, 12:30 am to see if i could see anything again. the second i got to the same place i had seen the others the night before; i saw a glittery shimmery white/green lights way up in the sky. again, i thought it was a plane, but one that was properly 30,000 feet up in the air. i watched it. it went in a straight-ish line through half the sky, then just turned and went straight down. it was blinking/shimmering and it stopped in 1 area of the sky, and then vanished. a minute later another object came out of the sky in the exact same place, turned at the same place, stopped at the same place and then vanished. for the next 45 minutes i watched different lights zig zag all over the sky, all with the same kind of glittery lights of green and white.
they were so far away, that it was hard to tell really what they were. i wasnt afraid as they were so far, i couldnt tell if it was as far as a plane, or as far as space. they were just lights that were brighter than the stars, but i couldnt ever see a body of the object.
then i walked a few blocks and i saw 4 bright yellow-orange objects over the houses across the field. i watched them for about 30 min. let's call them ���fireballs���. they hover over the houses and don���t seem to move much. they bob over and around the tops of those houses in that one area. the lights are so bright. some of them get brighter and brighter and then just disappear. some of them move like they���re floating but they always go off in the same direction and disappear at the same-ish spot in the sky. i see a few of them coming from the east to where they rest over the houses, but many of them just appear. i was watching 2 of them over the houses and then a third one just came and then a 4th one. they���re so bright you cant tell if they are super far away or really just over the houses. but they are at the roof levels. they are here every night so far. different numbers of them. i left because it was getting late but they were still there. i didnt feel anything about them because they were just strange lights.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireballs and glittery objects far away that changed direction and vanished at the same point.

content.detailedDescription:
I got up to use bathroom then went to kitchen to get drink of water.  i looked out of the window and saw 1 golden "orb" , then looked more to the right and saw another one.  i watched it for a couple of minutes, then got my binoculars and watched it for about 10 more minutes.  i wondered if the lights were just some reflection in this window, so went to bedroom window, and yep they were still there.  i then went and got my spotting scope and was able to look at the orb farthest to the right and saw the globes pulsate back and forth.  i then used my binoculars as they were more stable.  as i watched, i thought i saw the form of a human.  i went to every window on that side of the house just to make sure i was actually seeing what i was seeing.  i was afraid to go outside to look.   after about 45 minutes, i became quite sleepy and went back to bed and went right to sleep.

the following morning i kept wondering what the lights were, so i walked down the lane for a way with my binoculars thinking perhaps there were some lights on top of the irrigation pipes, but there were none.  i didn't walk out into the pasture as the property belongs to someone else.  

last night i wondered if perhaps someone has yard lights on their ranches that possibly were visible from my windows after dark.  and no, there were no lights last night, so they weren't yard lights.

i know what i saw.  i'm not fearful or upset in any way.  i have just had another level added to my reality.
content.summary: Got up during night, looked out kitchen window, saw 2 golden "orbs" sw of house.  watched them w/binoculars .

content.detailedDescription: About 2 minutes after those first ships disappeared from my sight; all of a sudden i saw another thing that i thought was a plane flying east to west. it has absolutely no sound at all. it was so quiet and i heard nothing. i noticed it too had flashing white and green lights. but from the front it had a bright white light that was shining out really far in front of it. i first thought it was a helicopter looking for the other 2 ship-things i just saw, but it had absolutely no sound. a beam shining straight down as if it were searching for something. as it moved passed me, about 100 feet above the ground, i could see part of the craft that seemed like maybe 2 discs in the back side by side and 1 disc in the front that was higher than those 2 discs and that one had the white beam-light. it was definitely not a helicopter. it never hovered or stopped. but it still had a bobbing or floating quality to the movement. not just in one straight motion. it was flying right over the highway. it was about 4 times the size of the smaller 2 (70-80 feet). i think maybe that the crafts can stick together and then break apart so this could have been a collection of 4 crafts maybe? i chased it down the street but the houses got in my way of the view and when i could finally get a good sight of it traveling north, it just was totally gone. when i ran around the house to see where it went, it was nowhere to be seen. it came from the east to west, then changed and went up over the houses to the north.
content.summary: After watching a strange object fly into the distance, once it was gone then this helicopter-like thing appeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside the hotel i'm at looking towards the franklin mountains (past which is el paso airport as well as a military base)i like to look up at the stars and the flashing red of a plane or chopper caught my eye, oddly i saw another set of flashing lights behind it some distance then my jaw dropped, i've seen ufo's before but never a triangle. in between both of the other aircraft was a triangle with a green light at each point also forming a triangle. i called my wife who was inside at the time and told her to run outside and fast (all objects and aircraft were going quite slow.) after i hung up, two of the 3 green lights dimmed out followed by the third. she missed them, but after she came out i pointed them out and she noticed a third aircraft with the flashing red lights behind the first two where the triangle was in between, though in front of this last one was a dull not lit object. they all kept flying out of my view but never altered course or sped/slowed down except the triangle's lights went out. it was crazy!
content.summary: Short sighting, 3 helicopters or planes with two or more ufo's

content.detailedDescription: I was talking with a friend on the phone in my back yard about 930 pm .  i saw a light in the sky bright like the planets you see bigger than a star or satellite.   i did not notice at first it was moving until i looked again and noticed it was coming towards me heading north.  i told my friend what i was seeing and of course he said sure...  i told him there were no flashing lights and this thing was making absolutely  no noise.  just a bright light.  he believes   but did not believe me so i told him i was hanging up and recording with my phone.  and that is what i did this object started a gradual swing to the east heading towards my friends house in issaquah  washington.  i filmed the light and during this flashed over to show an airplane flying by at the same time then went back to the ufo  before it went behind trees and i could no longer see it.  i called my friend back and told him what i did and he could now see the object flying near his home.  his home has at least ten times less outdoor noise than mine and he  could not hear anything or see any flashing airplane lights  .  he also said that it fluttered up and down a bit while we were talking.  then it went out of his sight as well.  i have seen a low flying wing type craft in the 90s in kansas while on a midnight shift with the atchison police dept.  also witnessed by a friend with me at the time.  this craft was a dark black no lights what so ever and moving to slow to maintain lift with air.  this craft had no noise and no obvious jets to propel itself through the sky.  so in my back yard i saw this and used my military knowledge and experience looking at facts and i knew this was a ufo.    i do not have video uploaded to computer  not a tech wiz.   feel free to give me a call [phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Talking to friend on phone saw bright constant light heading towards me told friend i was going to record it with my phone

content.detailedDescription: On july 17, 2012  i went for a walk at 12:30 am. i was walking in a dark field. i noticed a plane with green and white flashing lights in the sky. but realized it was coming so quickly towards me, i watched it and saw that it wasn���t a plane. there were 2 flashing white lights on top. at an angle down from the white lights were green flashing lights. i realized the thing was only about 100 feet above ground. it was coming right towards me. i was standing there trying to figure out what it could be. it was totally silent. when i finally thought ���omg, this thing must be a ufo!��� it instantly turned towards me and started descending to me. i noticed that the thing that i thought was 1 ���ship��� changed and it was actually 2 flying side by side the whole time. so they broke apart and manoeuvred around so that they were coming right for me. the flashing lights changed to just be a shining light and the green lights stopped. when it got about 50 feet from me i was panicking. it stopped and just hovered. i was so scared of what might happen, i thought to myself, run! and the instant i thought that, they moved back to the exact position they were in and just slowly returned to moving south. i watched it go over the trees and saw that the lights at the back were slowly flashing red. i walked away and wanted to follow it and see what it did over the field a few blocks away. when i got there the 2 ships were again flying side by side over the highway, with red lights slowly flashing. it was about 100 feet over the ground. i watched them move until out of my sight, about 5 minutes. i never saw the actual shape of the craft. the lights were bright, but maybe because the sky was so black i couldn���t see it? i don���t know, but i couldn���t see any shape at all. from the lights i estimated it was about 15-20 feet long when they both were together, and half of that i suppose was the distance of 1 of them.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object had flashing green and white lights, came right down above a school 100 feet in front of me then slowly flew away.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 1st time a week ago,like looking out patio glass doors at sky being an artist like sunset colors-when it got dark about 5 pm noticed unusual cluster of very brite lites on clear nite no stars seen though ,saw airplanes fly in sky blinking red lite in their normal flight route'object never moved-like stuck in spot helicopter for over2 hrs.From one side it turned on a briter beam of lite towards the east an fromm other side a beam aiming west-in a blink it was gone-like shutting off a lamp--too far too  hi in sky to hear anything-no trail left-i notified nat.Ufo center they called me.Reported to police hdqrt.Around corner from me 2nd time witnessed same brite lites 2 days later at nite ,neighbor notified me she said"theyre back" observed same configuration lower this time but very far off.Dec.15 at 4:40 clear sky same object sighted when i looked out my patio doors very hi up still brite lites, wish i had binoculars because i know its far away but those lites are very powerful and again stationary gone after 2hrs,i asked police officer who said he wanted to see from roof of 1 story police bldg.I did not recontact him but he has it in non emergency report i'm sure.We who have observed this wonder and are excited to see return of whatever it is-we are a retirement 12 story hirise in area. last nite in a blink moved to another westerly location ,lower in sky and all i can say to describe movement is it is if you had a flashlite in your hand pointed east turned it off -pointed it westerly and turned it on again but so fast you did not see it move to other area.My cell phone pictures are too tiny to see. i can not send drawing from this cheap laptop
content.summary: This is 3d time veiwing along w/other tenants.We live in 12 story/i am on 6th

content.detailedDescription: It was halloween night(7pm), 2012. i was on our bay window looking out at he stars with my 2yr old and noticed what i thought was a star or planet because of it's brightness(i just glanced at it and looked down to get my son's attention). when i looked back up, i noticed it was moving but there were no flashing lights on it. it seems to be flying towards the south, higher than a plane. i then thought it could be the iss until it turned about 45 degrees (se)& outwards, it appeared to fly further away from our atmosphere until it disappeared.
content.summary: A light was seen in nightsky that made aprox 45degree turn towards atmospere and disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i first saw a  extremely fast moving aircraft headed north east headed out over the atlantic.Then a
solid slow moving fireball with one blinking white light. appearing from the south, right above the treeline. located the object with high powered binocs until the object was out over boon island about 40 degrees off the horizon. it went stealth almost like it burnt out like a shooting star. it then began to appear rabidly skipping positions at the blink of an eye all within a 500 hundred foot area. my impressions where that the aircraft was either scattering its position in order to make it difficult for a solid bearing on its location or communication using code patterning. the object then began to move from position a to position b using advanced magnetism. steep angle of attacks and 0 to hi velocity speed variants. object then appeared in the ne treeline by the cuddy sark on long sands. you could see a more red and green  lights moving in a rotating like fashion. shortly after the sighting a three light triangle pattern aircraft enter the space with a more predictable flight pattern.
my dogs behavior during this time became restless and the we had a lit candle in the room that was flickering extremely strongly and loud.
content.summary: Slow moving chinese lantern with terrestrial blinking white light. lights turn off 40 degrees east and began scattering its location rapidly using blue lights.Change of direction was as fast as a computer mouse.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog,when i happened to look up in the sky and saw four or five lights moving slowly in the sky. they looked like stars,but they were in a pattern and moving. i immediately went into the house and called my wife to come and see this so she wouldn't think i was crazy. with luck the objects were still where she could see them. we both were amazed to say the least!  i wanted to call someone at the time,but didn't know where to start,so i didn't until now,when i saw the article in the charlotte sun news paper. not that this should substantiate my sanity,i'm a retired police lieutenant.
content.summary: These lights were in a formation

content.detailedDescription: 8 pm , i was sitting in my hot tub, enjoying the moonlit clear/ starry sky, and i was thinking it was a perfect night to see a ufo. i thought that it would be cool to see one of those orange orbs that other people see. i am always looking at the sky as i have seen many interesting things, which i have reperted here.  i looked back to the spot that i thought would be the best place to see one- and- seriously - there it was- a glowing orange orb just hovering there, not quite directly above me, but moving towards my location. my heart was racing, and i was feeling vulnerable in that i seemed to have ask for this visit, but was not liking that it seemed to come towards me. i jumped out of the tub  and put a towel on, then decided to go for my camera. i got back and it was still there and i got a great shot of it, before it faded away. i thought at first that it was rising up through clouds, but there were no clouds. wow- i feel exhuberant and shakey and so much adrenaline running through me. this isnt the first time i've felt like there was some level of communication between myself and other strange observations in the sky.
content.summary: Glowing orange orb hover and moving above me in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: Driving back from 7-11 with mother and talking then right in front of us in the sky there was a v shaped object with aprox 5 bright white lights on each side so aprox  10 white lights and a couple red flashing lights.Was flying low and couldnt have been a plane the way it was banking tried to follow it but it just disappeared.No noise came from this object..I know this was not a plane.Never seen anything like this..
content.summary: V shaped object with aprox 5 bright white lights on each length of v so aprox 10 white and flashing red  banking and disapearing

content.detailedDescription: Walking to the car after food shopping i notice the nearly full moon.  i took out my phone to take a picture of it, shot the picture, and also hit the button to make a video.  when i looked at the picture i saw a light beside the moon i had not noticed.  i then saw that a video had been made too.  i checked it to see if the orb appeared, and it did.  in the video the orb moved rapidly up in an arcing manner and then sharply down disappearing behind the moon.  i went back to the still shot and zoomed in as much as i could; it looks like something with a distinct shape.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I took a picture of the moon and then made a short video of it.  when i looked at the picture i saw an orb next to the moon.  when i looked at the video the orb moved.  when i blew up the picture on the phone, the orb had a snape something i have not seen

content.detailedDescription:
The game camera is 70 yards from the power line where the orb is. by the way, the time shown in the photos is correct, however, i didnt bother to set the date. the actual date of the photos is 15 dec 1013.
in the first photo, you can see the shaft of light (faintly) coming down from the top of the photo.
in the third photo you can see the orb has moved.
in the game camera, the first faint shaft of light appeared at 3:35:17. the light was gone by 4:41:00.
 the game camera is about 800 yards north of my house.
in mid august i spotted the light about 600 yards south of my house in the neighbors property. it was moving at tree top level. there is a power line there also.
my aunt and i first saw the light in mid july.  about a week later, a large glowing light (orb) to the west was seen and  has been in residence nightly for the past four months. when the large light to the west was there, i didnt see the light you see in the photo. but, the large light hasnt been around for the past four nights. i read several posts on the internet where people witnessed a large orb firing on a smaller one. guess the orb in the photo thought it was safe to come back.
i had reported the large westerly orb to mufon in a previous post.
content.summary: White orb hovering above power line witnessed by game camera

content.detailedDescription: When we first noticed the ufo, it was exactly 7;30.  we were looking north to view the satellite launching from virginia that day, supposedly we would be able to see it from north carolina.  when we noticed a neon blue light racing in the sky over our neighbors house, then changing in color several times and sometimes flashing a red light on top of the object.  the object would hover for several minutes and then manuevers very quickly in speed, faster than any plane.  i knew the object was not normal from the first moment i saw it.  my family is also witness to this happening, and it has happened several times throughout the week every week for a month now.  i have tried catching it on video with no luck, we are still trying and still seeing it all the time.  the object always shows up in same area and disappears over the tree line when we dont see it anymore.
content.summary: My family has observed this multiple times over the last month.  it seems to happen between 7 and 8 30, usually for 10 -15 min.
